mapper.select: select * from (select distinct sendName, s_memberNum from message where s_memberNum=#{memberNum} or r_memberNum=#{memberNum}) where s_memberNum not in #{memberNum}
select * from (select distinct receiveName, r_memberNum from message where s_memberNum=#{memberNum} or r_memberNum=#{memberNum}) where r_memberNum not in #{memberNum}

select * from (select m.*, TO_CHAR(sendDate, 'HH24:MI:SS') as sendTime from (select * from message where s_memberNum=#{r_memberNum} or r_memberNum=#{r_memberNum}) m where (s_memberNum=#{r_memberNum} and r_memberNum=#{s_memberNum}) or (s_memberNum=#{s_memberNum} and r_memberNum=#{r_memberNum}))
